Message:
I wanted to save my family.
The family I was supposed
to have loved.

But, I was so scared...
All I thought was that
I didn’t want to die...

Then, I was given my power...
My...punishment...

You can stab me!
Crush me!
Even break me!!

...But, I can’t even die...
For the rest of eternity,
I’ll live on...alone...

“Don’t worry.
That power can become
someone else’s solace.”

I know who you are,
“Witch of Murder.”
You destroyed a single city, was it?
If only I had that kind of power too...

As my words trailed off,
the witch looked at me,
shook her head, and spoke.

“This power isn’t as good
as you think it is.”
